content: this is a cute and simple baby/toddler cardigan pattern featuring a top-down raglan design with a v-neck easily customisable with short sleeves pockets applique etc and great in a solid colour variegated or stripes stitches used in pattern us terms single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fpdc bpdc 2hdc increase 2hdctog decrease being a fairly simple pattern i d say it s suitable from confident beginner upwards this pattern has been tested but there may still be errors feel free to contact me if you notice anything that needs editing or clarification
